group_1.textCenter: (I'm helpless... @I can't do anything unless I!)

group_1.textLeft: ...aaaaaahhh!
Hm?
Phew... I must've dozed off.
What a cruddy dream...@Must've been about the fight...
It had to be.@[chara:300801:cheek_0:face_mtn_ex_030.exp.json]...Ugh, I'm still so tired...
Hm? Oh, it's you, Sasara.@[chara:300801:cheek_0:face_mtn_ex_010.exp.json]Didn't expect to run into you here.

group_1.textRight: I know, I was just out for a walk.@[chara:300401:cheek_0:face_mtn_ex_001.exp.json]What are you up to?

group_1.textLeft: I've been looking for a lost item...
An old dude from the neighborhood. @He lost something while he was taking a walk.

group_1.textRight: So he came to Sankyoin's@[chara:300401:cheek_0:face_mtn_ex_041.exp.json:motion_200]one and only for help, huh?
I can't blame him; you do good work!@That's what I admire about you...

group_1.textLeft: Sure, the Troubleshooter.@It sounds great, but...
It's really only because I can't @say no to people in need.

group_1.textRight: Still, it's not like anyone pays you.@It's all really nice of you.
Or at least, I think it's pretty cool.
You're a knight, just like me!

group_1.textLeft: A knight...?

group_1.textRight: Don't worry about it.@I just got carried away.
So did you find the...well, whatever you were@looking for?

group_1.textLeft: Not yet. I looked all over, sat down to@take a break, and then I woke up.

group_1.textRight: Wow, you must been tired.@[chara:300401:cheek_0:face_mtn_ex_001.exp.json]Can I give you a hand?

group_1.textLeft: Oh man, would you?!@[chara:300801:cheek_0:face_mtn_ex_030.exp.json]That'd be a huge help...

group_1.textRight: Of course! What are we looking for?

group_1.textLeft: A cane.

group_1.textRight: Really? @How did he forget his cane?

group_1.textLeft: You'd be surprised to know just how many@canes are at Lost and Founds.

group_1.textRight: Wait a minute... That's right!@Does it happen to have a red handle?

group_1.textLeft: Yes! How the heck did you know that?

group_1.textRight: I saw some little kids playing with a red@cane not too long ago...

group_1.textLeft: That's it, then! @Where were they?
Mind showing me?
Thanks, Sasara. Let's go![chara:300801:effect_fadeout][chara:300401:effect_fadeout]

group_1.textCenter: The name's Akira Shinobu. And before you
Stick around for a bit and I'll fill you in@on my story.
But first, let me teach you a phrase
my father taught me when I was little@that's really important to me:
Keep that in mind. Now, on with my story...
...and how it led me to another Magical Girl.
